column5: Come stay like a KING or a QUEEN on KINGSWAY DR in The South Room, in a queen size bed with a share bathroom with shower/tub, in a townhouse with 2 1/2 baths  2 miles to UTA  4 miles to AT&T stadium, Globe Life Ballpark, Six Flags 11 miles to Verizon/Nokia Theater 17 miles to DFW 21 miles to downtown Dallas 14 miles to downtown Fort Worth We can arrange pick-ups from anywhere in the DFW area as well as the airports for an additional fee. See the Getting Around section below.
column8: Arlington between Dallas & Ft Worth*The South Room
